```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
path_models <- format_path("studydata/risk/models/ema")
path_data_shared <- format_path("studydata/risk/data_processed/shared")
path_data_ema <- format_path("studydata/risk/data_processed/ema")
```
:::
::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
# Create data
data <- tibble(
  name = c("A","B","C","D","E") ,  
  value = c(3,12,5,18,45)
  )
```
:::

::: {#cell-fig-1 .cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-1
#| fig-cap: "A Basic Barplot Figure"

ggplot(data, aes(x=name, y=value)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![A Basic Barplot Figure](fig1_files/figure-html/fig-1-1.png){#fig-1 width=672}
:::
